umjikelo womyalelo: Amanyathelo alandelwa yi-CPU ukwenza umyalelo omnye
superscalar architecture: Uyilo lwe-CPU olunokuphumeza imiyalelo emininzi kumjikelo wewotshi nganye
uqikelelo lwesebe: Ubuchwephesha apho i-CPU izama ukuqikelela ukuba yeyiphi na indlela umqathango oya kuhamba ngayo
northbridge: I-Chipset (iinkqubo ezindala) ezidibanise i-CPU kwi-RAM kunye neebhasi ezihamba ngesantya esiphezulu
southbridge: I-Chipset (iinkqubo ezindala) eziphethe iiperipherals ezicothayo kunye ne-I/O
hyperthreading: Itekhnoloji evumela undoqo we-CPU ukuba ubonakale njengeecores ezininzi ezinengqiqo
risc: Umyalelo oNcitshisiweyo weSeti yeKhompyutha- uyilo lwe-CPU enemiyalelo elula
cisc: IComplex Instruction Instruction Seti yeKhompyutha- uyilo lwe-CPU enemiyalelo enamandla, entsonkothileyo
simd: Umyalelo omnye weData ezininzi, ubuchule bokucubungula idatha ngokuhambelanayo
microarchitecture: Iinkcukacha zomiliselo ezithe ngqo zeseti yemiyalelo ye-CPU
inkqubo kwitshiphu: Ukudibanisa amacandelo amaninzi (CPU, GPU, njl.) kwi-chip enye
inkqubo elungisiweyo: Inkqubo yekhompyuter enikezelwe kumsebenzi othile, rhoqo ngaphakathi kwesixhobo esikhulu
overclocking: Ukuqhuba i-CPU ngesantya esiphezulu kunoko kuchaziweyo
ikhowudi yokulungisa impazamo: Ubuchwephesha bokubona kunye nokulungisa iimpazamo kwi-RAM
ukuphunyezwa ngaphandle komyalelo: Ubuchwephesha apho i-CPU iphumeza imiyalelo ngolandelelwano olunempumelelo ngakumbi
i-neuromorphic computing: Uyilo lwekhompyuter oluphefumlelweyo lwenzelwe imisebenzi ye-AI
